title: Frozen Mallet Vayne Top
body: Alright so since apparently I'm just a bronze scrub who complains about everything being op on the boards I'm now generally asking for advice. How do you beat a Vayne top building frozen mallet? I legit picked mundo and rushed thornmail + Sunfire Cape and both me and the jungler were unable to do anything except both die constantly trying to gank her. Since everyone in the game just decided to call me "trash" and a "monkey" I'm taking it to the boards to ask on how to beat this.

replies.body:
1. Don't build Thornmail, build Frozen Heart (AS slowing Aura)
2. Get the whole team to hard focus the vayne
3. Buy pinks/get an upgraded Sweeper
Frozen heart hmmm, I'll take that into consideration

Max Cleavers, call for help, get boots asap, continue buy some health and armour because early on Vayne will be dealing more physical damage than true damage. This is especially true at level 6. Use your cleavers to either last hit creeps or harass vayne given the opportunity. 

Vayne might be mobile but she is vulnerable to ganks especially if the jungler/toplaner has ranged CC.
Literally everything I did except my jg was a tryndamere so vayne just ended up kiting us both...

Well Tryndamere jungle while not bad isn't exactly good imo. If he went someone like {{champion:60}}  hohoho your lane would be a totally different story. 

Honestly I think your best option is to just farm it out and hope for an opportunity.
